Module chapter11
Package CMSC130.Ch11

Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
CMSC130.Ch11.GeometricObject
CMSC130.Ch11.Triangle
public class Triangle extends CMSC130.Ch11.GeometricObject
Public child class that creates a 'Triangle' object from a 'GeometricObject' parent class. Includes: +toString() +getArea() +getPerimeter() +Getters/Setters for all three sides (side1, side2, side3)

  • Method Details

    • getArea

      public double getArea()
      Accessor method for area of an inherited 'Triangle' object. Calculation done using Heron's formula and the 'java.lang.Math' default package
      Returns:
      Area of object-type 'Triangle' in a primitive double data-type

    • getPerimeter

      public double getPerimeter()
      Returns:
      side1+side2+side3 [the perimeter is calculated with all three sides]
